forum.content:
我個人是最喜歡how to be single的這一段⬇️

「I've been thinking that the time we have to be single is really the time we have to get good at being alone.
But, how good at being alone do we really want to be?
Isn't there a danger that you'll get so good to being single
so set in you way, that you'll miss out the chance to be with somebody great?」

會不會有那麼一天
我們真的太過於習慣跟沈溺在單身的好
而錯過了那些很棒的或是值得我們去愛的人？

超級有意義的一段話⋯⋯
單身有好也有壞
但是如果因為單身而錯過了那些美好的人事物
就很糟糕了 對吧？
forum.title: 電影金句，妳們喜歡哪一段？
